Package audio.processing.tools

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Fader
    A Fader Unit which allows user to adjust the level of the incoming signal my multiplying each sample in the signal by a float value determined in the GUI.
    FaderEffect
    A Fader Effect which allows user to adjust the level of the incoming signal my multiplying each sample in the signal by a float value determined in the GUI.
    HalfSampleRate
    A HalfSampleRate unit to ..
    InvertWave
    A Invert unit to invert a WaveForm
    MatchFilter  
    NodeMixer
    Signal Mixing Unit which allows user to simultaneously play many audio files at one time.
    Normaliser
    A Normalisation unit which allows the user to control the gain of the audio file's selection to the maximum level without clipping (digital distortion).
    NormaliserEffect
    A Normalisation unit which allows the user to control the gain of the audio file's selection to the maximum level without clipping (digital distortion).
    PitchDet
    A PitchDet unit to ..
    Rectifier
    A Rectifier unit to ..
    Reverse
    A Reverse Effect which reverses the input wave.
    ReverseEffect
    A Reverse Effect which reverses the input wave.
